name: Of All the Bridges in All the Galaxy
description: Any good detective likes a tough case with a little danger thrown in for spice. But when classified details from the investigation into a Klingon general's murder end up peppered into a holoprogram, the only solution is to solve the mystery!
rules:
-- In a Specialist Event, you will select crew to engage in Specialist Missions.
-- Only a single crew with corresponding skills can be assigned to a Specialist Mission. After the mission is completed, that crew will be disabled from doing Specialist Missions for some period of time.
-- Specialist Missions take time to complete. The higher selected crew skills are the less time it will take them to complete a mission.
-- Only the highest skill of a crew is considered when calculating time to complete a mission.
-- Using crew with matching Specialist Mission bonus traits will significantly decrease time needed to complete a mission.
-- Each time a Specialist Mission is completed, some progress is also gained on the Main Mission. Completing the Main Mission rewards substantial amounts of Event Victory Points.
-- Using Vezda, any version of La'an, Bytha, M'Benga, Costumed, or SNW crew will provide a chance to gain bonus progress on the Main Mission.
-- When you fail to gain bonus progress on the Main Mission using featured crew or crew with matching event bonus traits, the bonus progress chance goes up slightly the next time you use such crew in a mission. If you score the bonus progress, the bonus chance amount goes back to its initial value. 
-- Community Rewards are also available during Phase 1 only. Collect Event Victory Points to unlock these rewards before the phase change!
-- You earn Event Victory Points each time you complete a Specialist Mission or the Main Mission. Collect Event Victory Points to unlock Threshold Rewards!
bonus_text: Bonus: Vezda, La'an, Bytha, M'Benga, Costumed, SNW
rewards_teaser: Reach Rank 1 by gaining Victory Points from Specialist Missions!

featured_crew.name: Sonya
featured_crew.flavor: Extremely outgoing, curious, and eager, Sonya Gomez began her Starfleet career as an ensign on the U.S.S. Enterprise-D under La Forge.

action.name: Have I Been Talking Too Much?

featured_crew.name: Bytha
featured_crew.flavor: The daughter of the infamous Dak’Rah, she chose the path of vengeance, with M’Benga's death her ultimate goal.

action.name: There Was One Way To Restore Our Name

featured_crew.name: M'Benga
featured_crew.flavor: During his shore leave, M’Benga chose a quiet activity - fly-fishing.

rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 6 Polestars: Command, Diplomacy, Security, Engineering, Science, Medicine

rewards.name: ISM
rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

rewards.name: Dilithium
rewards.flavor: Dilithium is your most valuable asset. Use Dilithium in the Time Portal to acquire valuable crew members, items, and more.

rewards.name: Honor
rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.name: Merits
rewards.flavor: Merits can be earned by completing missions. Use Merits to acquire faction-based rewards, upgrades to your ship, and more.

rewards.name: Training
rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

rewards.name: Sonya
rewards.flavor: Extremely outgoing, curious, and eager, Sonya Gomez began her Starfleet career as an ensign on the U.S.S. Enterprise-D under La Forge.

rewards.name: M'Benga
rewards.flavor: During his shore leave, M’Benga chose a quiet activity - fly-fishing.

rewards.name: Bytha
rewards.flavor: The daughter of the infamous Dak’Rah, she chose the path of vengeance, with M’Benga's death her ultimate goal.

action.name: There Was One Way To Restore Our Name

rewards.name: 10x Portal
rewards.flavor: 10 valuable items. Go to Time Portal to collect!

quest.name: Of All the Bridges in the Galaxy

screens.text: "We've certainly found ourselves in a conundrum here, Captain. What I believe people in the 20th century would call a 'pickle'. An innocent holodeck test has turned into something a little more...serious."

"Perhaps if you in Starfleet weren't so eager to meddle in the affairs of others, you could enjoy your little holographic mystery. But we cannot allow you to go with information that isn't even available to the other Great Houses."

"We weren't meddling. Perhaps if you were paying attention when you were passing classified information while cloaked and passing so close to our ship, this wouldn't have happened. But here we are. A murder scene recreated in hologram. The only thing missing? Our suspect."
"I really need to plan my shore leave better. I was hoping to catch fish today, not a killer. Captain, could you help us solve this mystery so I might actually have a chance of enjoying my time off?"
